ereldyn was a War Wizard of Cormyr in the late 14 century DR.
Bereldyn was a part of the retinue of the Royal Magician of Cormyr, Caladnei in early spring of , when they raided the Marsember meeting of the Rightful Conspiracy. He was assigned afterwards to find Khornadar of Westgate, a mage working with the conspirators, but Caladnei forewarned him Laspeera thought it may have been a greater mage in disguise.
